Noam Chomsky

Alive

Born: 12/7/1928 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA

Age: 95

Full name: Avram Noam Chomsky

Noted For: linguist; theorized that there is a Universal Grammar that is common to all human languages and that humans have an innate understanding of it. Also known for his leftist political views.

Also see this person's photo entry in our Dead or Alive Data Base.
